document.full_text: "in conversation: outside the ring with hulk hogan" is envisioned as a hulk-ified version of "inside the actors studio" (with perhaps more atomic leg drops than james lipton's incarnation).
document.title: hulkamania really is coming for you: hulk hogan plans live tour
